parameters

```{r}
results %>%
  dplyr::group_by(method) %>%
  dplyr::summarise(
    mmse = mean(mse),
    count = n(),
    vmse = var(mse),
    low = mean(mse) - 1.96 * sqrt(var(mse) / n()),
    high = mean(mse) + 1.96 * sqrt(var(mse) / n()), 
  ) 
```

parameters

```{r}
summary(results)
```


```{r fig.width=15, fig.height=8}
results %>%
  dplyr::mutate(method = factor(recode(results$method,
                                bc = "DR",
                                bct = "Oracle DR",
                                conf = "BTR",
                                pl = "PL"),
                levels = rev(c(
                  "bc_true_prop",
                  "bc_true_mu",
                  "bc_rt_true_mu",
                  "bc_rt_muest",
                  "conf1se",
                  "pl1se",
                  "regression_diff",
                  "Oracle DR",
                           "DR",
                           "PL",
                           "BTR"))))-> results
results %>%
  dplyr::group_by(method) %>%
  dplyr::filter(!(method %in% c("bc_true_prop",
                  "bc_true_mu",
                  "bc_rt_true_mu",
                  "bc_rt_muest",
                  "conf1se",
                  "pl1se",
                  "regression_diff"))) %>%
  dplyr::summarise(
    mmse = mean(mse),
    low = mean(mse) - 1.96 * sqrt(var(mse) / n()),
    high = mean(mse) + 1.96 * sqrt(var(mse) / n()), 
  ) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = method, y = mmse, color = method)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = low, ymax = high)) +
  ylab(TeX("$E\\[(\\nu(V) - \\hat{\\nu}(V))^2\\]$")) +
  scale_color_manual(values = cbPalette) +
  theme_bw(base_size = 20) + 
theme(legend.position = "bottom") 
ggsave(glue::glue(img_folder, "misspec_scatter.pdf"), width = 15, height = 8)
```

# bar plot

```{r fig.width=6, fig.height=6}
results %>%
  dplyr::group_by(method) %>%
  dplyr::filter(!(method %in% c("bc_true_prop",
                  "bc_true_mu",
                  "bc_rt_true_mu",
                  "bc_rt_muest",
                  "conf1se",
                  "pl1se",
                  "regression_diff"))) %>%
  dplyr::summarise(
    mmse = mean(mse),
    low = mean(mse) - 1.96 * sqrt(var(mse) / n()),
    high = mean(mse) + 1.96 * sqrt(var(mse) / n()), 
  ) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = method, y = mmse, color = method, fill = method)) +
  geom_col() +
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = low, ymax = high), color = "black") +
  theme_bw(base_size = 18) +
  theme(legend.position = "none") +
   ylab(TeX("$E\\[(\\nu(V) - \\hat{\\nu}(V))^2\\]$")) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = cbPalette) +
ggsave(glue::glue(img_folder, "misspec_bar.pdf"), width = 9, height = 7)
```
